sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都有"兴旺，成功"之意。
means: flourish ： 指处于成功、繁荣、进步的顶盛阶段。
thrive ： 指蓬勃发展，常指显而易见的成功。
succeed ： 表示成功，强调完成某件想往或企图去做的事，与fail相对。
prosper ： 指持续不断地成功，也指越来越成功。

sentence.Network_en: Creative people are usually very determined and thrive on overcoming obstacles.
sentence.Network_cn: 富有创造力的人一般都意志非常坚定，能不断克服困难，事业蒸蒸日上。

sentence.Network_en: Today his company continues to thrive.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天，他的公司继续蓬勃发展。

sentence.Network_en: Many people thrive on a stressful lifestyle.
sentence.Network_cn: 有许多人喜欢充满压力的生活方式。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (originally in the sense 'grow, increase'): from Old Norse thrífask, reflexive of thrífa 'grasp, get hold of'. Compare with thrift

entry.tran: 欣欣向荣;茁壮成长;兴旺发达
entry.def: If someone or something thrives, they do well and are successful, healthy, or strong.

example.ex: Today his company continues to thrive...
example.tran: 今天，他的公司继续蓬勃发展。
薰衣草在贫瘠的土壤中茁壮生长。

entry.tran: (尤指在别人觉得困难的时候)以…为乐，可以出色应对
entry.def: If you say that someone thrives on a particular situation, you mean that they enjoy it or that they can deal with it very well, especially when other people find it unpleasant or difficult.

example.ex: Many people thrive on a stressful lifestyle...
example.tran: 有许多人喜欢充满压力的生活方式。

example.ex: Creative people are usually very determined and thrive on overcoming obstacles.
example.tran: 富有创造力的人一般都意志非常坚定，能不断克服困难，事业蒸蒸日上。

auth_sentence.content: You can thrive being different, independent, modern.
auth_sentence.res_content: You can thrive being different, independent, modern.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You can thrive being different, independent, modern.

auth_sentence.content: Fertility-finance companies say the industry will continue to thrive.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fertility-finance companies say the industry will continue to thrive.

auth_sentence.content: Why does one virtual team thrive while another stumbles?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why does one virtual team thrive while another stumbles?

Sentence.sentence: In the next couple of years the businesses that thrive will be those that are tight with costs, careful of debt, cautious with cash flow and extremely attentive to what customers want.
Organizations cannot thrive without being focused on their desired end results any more than an individual can thrive without goals to provide a sense of purpose.
Organizations cannot thrive without being focused on their desired end results any more than an individual can thrive without goals to provide a sense of purpose.
The American economy used to thrive on immigration but now it's a different story.

sentences.en: A business cannot thrive without good management.
sentences.cn: 商业兴旺离不开好的管理。

sentences.en: Few plants or animals thrive in the desert.
sentences.cn: 极少数植物或动物能在沙漠中茁壮成长。

jushi.english: A business cannot thrive without good management.
jushi.chinese: 管理不善的企业不可能兴盛。

jushi.english: Children thrive in the country air.
jushi.chinese: 乡村的空气使孩子们长得健壮。

jushi.english: Now that the highway is finished, the shopping centre should thrive.
jushi.chinese: 由于这条公路已经竣工,那个商业中心一定会兴隆起来。
